name: sample-concierge-agent
description: Generic AI agent streaming UI for concierge anget with AWS Amplify

scripts.deploy:mcp: find concierge_agent/mcp_* -name Dockerfile -exec touch {} \; && cd infrastructure/mcp-servers && npm install && cdk deploy --all --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:agent: cd infrastructure/agent-stack && npm install && cdk deploy --require-approval never && cd ../.. && ./scripts/sync-gateway.sh
scripts.deploy:visa-lambda: cd infrastructure/visa-lambda-stack && npm install && cdk deploy --context deploymentId=$(node -p "require('../../deployment-config.json').deploymentId") --require-approval never
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd infrastructure/frontend-stack && npm install && cdk deploy --require-approval never && cd ../.. && ./scripts/deploy-frontend.sh
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:amplify && npm run deploy:mcp && npm run deploy:agent && npm run deploy:visa-lambda
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:agent && npm run clean:mcp && npm run clean:visa-lambda && npm run clean:amplify
